Hazel brings together the best

architects and builders to

provide a stress-free building

experience.

Personal support

We guide you through every step of the process to ensure your building experience goes as smoothly as possible.

10 year warranty

Your peace of mind is assured with 10 years of excellent warranty coverage for any issues after completion.

Knowledge and experience

We bring together the right skills from trusted and vetted professionals, from initial sketches to permits and construction.

Haaven offers a better way to

build your space.

1. Select

Hazel Tiny houses are designed by world-class architects.

The unique designs are functionally perfected and offer a lot of comfort in a small tiny house. Select a design from the Haaven Collection, personalise it to your likes and we'll get started.

Select a design from the Hazel Collection

2. Plan

Found the perfect design? Hazel connects you with the right parties needed to build your space.

Hazel connects you to the right parties to build your space without any trouble. Hazel supports you through the whole process. We can perform a feasibility study and if needed we can support you with getting a permit.

After this weâ€™ll introduce you to your Head Contractor. An experienced and reliable building partner of Hazel who will take care of all things construction- from foundations to plumbing.

The whole time, Hazel keeps an eye on the process. We make sure everyone does their job and your wishes are fully met.

3. Build

Now that the team is assembled, we can build your new space.

The engineers and production facilities now get to work. They ensure the structural soundness of the design and produce high-quality elements in prefab factories around Europe.

Within 15 weeks, your home is transported and assembled. We minimise on-site labour as much as we can. This is better for your wallet and the peace of your neighbourhood.

From start to finish, Haaven guarantees no surprises. No unvetted suppliers. No hidden costs. No unexpected delays. And, full control to you.

4. Enjoy

Once the home is placed, itâ€™s time to make it yours.

This stage is completely tailored to your personal wishes. Haaven can also support you in finishing your home until the last details.

All of our customers get access to private support channels. Got any questions or need help? Weâ€™re here to support you.

Plus, our team is always available to help you plan home renovations or any other future projects. Happy living and enjoy your Haaven space.
